scripts.start-all: concurrently  "npm run start:host-server" "npm run start:pos-server" "npm run start:table-server" "npm run start:manage-server"
scripts.start:pos-server: cd ./pos_server && npm run build && npm run start
scripts.start:table-server: cd ./kiosk_server && npm run build && npm run start
scripts.start:manage-server: cd ./client && npm run build && npm run start
